Title: Su-zakana
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Scott Nimerfro, Bryan Fuller, Steve Lightfoot
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Laurence Fishburne
Plot: Will assists the investigation into a woman's body found inside a horse, while Alana frets about Will's intentions toward Hannibal. With the clock ticking, Will and Hannibal race to protect a witness they believe to be in great peril.
